title: Mindset Shifting, from Victim to Victor
description:
When everything around you seems out of control, how can you go from feeling victimized and start to feeling empowered? Plus, workout emails, and guest Brad Lamm, author of “QUIT VAPING: Your Four-Step, 28 day Program to Stop Smoking E-Cigarettes.”

Guest link: BradLamm.com

Start your FREE 7 day trial for Jillian’s My Fitness App at https://go.jillianmichaels.com/WNt1rL7uyZ

Send us your brief question at jillianpodcast@gmail.com

Follow us on Instagram @JillianMichaels, @MartiniCindy
